name: Sol Reposado Tequila
description: Rested six months in American oak under the Jalisco sun. Golden warmth, cooked agave, and a buttery finish that lingers like a sunset.

tastingNotes.palate: Silky caramel, toasted oak, and white pepper

name: Sol Blanco Tequila
description: Unaged, crystal clear, and bursting with fresh agave character. Distilled from 100% blue Weber agave grown in the Los Altos highlands.

tastingNotes.nose: Fresh agave, lime zest, and jalapeño
tastingNotes.palate: Bright citrus, herbaceous agave, and mineral notes
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, crisp, with a pleasant peppery kick

name: Caña Dorada Rum
description: A Barbadian rum aged 8 years in charred bourbon barrels. Deep amber, rich molasses, and tropical warmth — pure Caribbean gold.

tastingNotes.nose: Molasses, toasted coconut, and tropical fruit
tastingNotes.palate: Rich toffee, banana, and warm baking spices
tastingNotes.finish: Long, velvety smooth, with a hint of cocoa

name: Lumbre Mezcal
description: Artisanal mezcal from Oaxaca, pit-roasted over mesquite for three days. Raw, smoky, and untamed — fire in a bottle.

tastingNotes.nose: Campfire smoke, roasted agave, and wet earth
tastingNotes.palate: Intense smoke, green chili, and charred pineapple
tastingNotes.finish: Very long, smoky, with a surprising mineral sweetness

name: Terracotta Añejo Tequila
description: Aged 18 months in French oak, this añejo is sophisticated and dessert-like. Dark amber with notes of fig, caramel, and toasted almond.

tastingNotes.nose: Fig, dark caramel, and toasted almond
tastingNotes.palate: Rich vanilla, dried fruit, and warm oak spice

name: Isla del Sol Coconut Rum
description: A light Caribbean rum infused with real coconut and a touch of lime. Sunshine in a glass — built for tropical cocktails.

tastingNotes.palate: Creamy coconut, citrus, and light caramel

name: Fuego Spiced Rum
description: A Guatemalan rum infused with habanero, cinnamon, and allspice. Sweet heat that builds slowly — not for the faint of heart.

tastingNotes.nose: Cinnamon, brown sugar, and a whisper of chili
tastingNotes.palate: Sweet molasses, warm spice, then building heat
tastingNotes.finish: Long, warming, with a slow chili burn

name: Solstice Cristalino Tequila
description: An añejo filtered through charcoal to crystal clarity. All the depth of aged tequila with the brightness of a blanco — the best of both worlds.

tastingNotes.nose: Vanilla, white peach, and subtle oak
tastingNotes.palate: Smooth agave, butterscotch, and gentle spice
